title: Allergy Injection Hours
description: Allergy & Asthma Specialists of KC offers immunotherapy, an effective injection treatment for perennial/seasonal allergies, & many more.
cleaned_text: You may benefit from allergy shots if you: Have symptoms not controlled with allergy medications Have side effects from allergy medicines Want to decrease medication use Have allergy triggers that you cannot avoid (e.g., pollen, dust) Have severe reactions to stinging insects (bees, wasps, hornets) Want to spend more time outdoors Want a better long-term solution to your allergy problem Allergy shots are also effective in the treatment of allergic asthma. Over time, they can help your breathing and decrease the need for asthma medicines. Allergy shots also benefit some patients with eczema or atopic dermatitis, when the condition is associated with other allergies.
